Title: The hearts of the poor and lower-middle peasants turn to the party, they never forget to manage their households industriously and thriftily
Publisher: Hebei sheng Shijiazhuang diqu tuchan gongsi (河北省石家庄地区土产公司), Shijiazhuang
Notes: Poor and lower-middle peasants may be poor, they still have rags and other junk to spare to contribute to the state. Poster published by the Hebei Province Shijiazhuang area local products company.Part of a series of four.
